column4: Hey guys. I have a ubuntu 9.1 server and I was wondering if I can get xserv running for purposes of a vnc connection if i have no grahpics card
vnc requires a graphics card on the server machine. but you might be able to get away with not having one by using freenx or ssh x forwarding. i'm not entirely sure though
I have full ssh root access, but was hoping to find a way to connect to a gui. I will check out freenx and ssh x forwarding. Any other suggestions?
